comments: accepts an IP or domain and returns either IP network ownership information or domain regristration infromation
check an internet ipv4 address against AbuseIPDB
accepts an IP or fqdn and summarizes information from Shodan known about the entiy
accepts an IP or fqdn and summarizes information from VirusTotal known about the entiy

accepts an IP,fqdn, domain and summarizes information frrin DNS about the entiy.  If the input is an IP address a dns resolution should be done returning the fqdn.  If a fqdn is provided as an input, a resolution shold be done and IP returned.  If a domain is passed, a summary of DNS information should be included - NS, MX, CName, A, AAA, and TXT
